code: import{createFetchHook}from'../fetch-hook.base';import{forumService}from'../../services/forum/Forum';export var useFetchForumPosts=function useFetchForumPosts(){var section=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:-1;var refresh=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return createFetchHook(function(){return forumService.getPosts(section);},section+refresh);};export var useFetchForumPostByID=function useFetchForumPostByID(section,postID){var refresh=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return createFetchHook(function(){return forumService.getPostByID(section,postID);},section+postID+refresh);};
